mean_cn: v. 给…保险，承诺支付，同意赔款（海上保险）
mean_en: to give money to support (something, such as a new business) and agree to be responsible for any losses if it fails
word_etyma: under在…下+write写→underwrute在…下面写，承诺支付
sentence: OK, I'll underwrite the loan if you promise you can pay.
sentence_trans: 好吧，如果你承诺会支付这笔钱，我就签这份贷款。
